subject: TweakTown Sim Racing Reviews
description_text:
Hi Simsonn,
 
I hope you are well.
 
TweakTown is expanding its sim racing review coverage, and we would like to feature your pedal sets as we continue to advance in this area.
 
We have recently covered the Moza R5 Bundle, Asetek Initium, and Trak Racer TR120S V2, with other reviews currently underway.
 
If this is of interest, we can provide an in-depth written review for the TweakTown.com website.
 
If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me.
 
Regards,
 
Kris
